entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
